website_summaries.verdict: Every young girl will love this Shopkins bed-in-a-bag; however, parents may be frustrated by the sizing discrepancy.
pros: The material in this set is very soft and of great quality, and the print matches all other Shopkins merchandise
cons: There is a discrepancy over whether this is a twin or full
While it says it's full-size, the comforter does not completely cover a full-size bed

customer_reviews.title: This is not a twin set
customer_reviews.text: I asked before I purchased after reading reviews that is was a full set, I received a reply that is was a TWIN, once I received them they were indeed a full set not twin.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Manville

customer_reviews.title: Colorful addition
customer_reviews.text: Darling for kids bed,medium quality,great colors,not so expensive if kid damaged to replace
customer_reviews.author: tootiej

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: My children loved their bed set... pricing could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Keplin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Sheets fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Sheets fit perfectly. I wish the blanket/comforter was just a little more bigger as my child has a full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Nicöle

customer_reviews.title: I wish the comforter was a little wider for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the comforter was a little wider for the full size bed. It barely reaches across the top of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy it too (hahaha)
customer_reviews.text: This is such a soft comforter and sheet set! My daughter loves it and when I nap in her bed, I enjoy it too (hahaha)! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: my daughter is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, and items were as exoected! Thank you, my daughter is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: It was a twin comforter with a full sheet set, not a full bed in a bag set. Totally misleading. Not worth what I paid for it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting the proper size that I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I got a twin size sheet set, for a full size set.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Noseworthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are super silky feeling. My daughter loves this.
customer_reviews.author: ARC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size sheets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered twin size, but the sheets are for full size. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Trikel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping time, material is great and fits perfect in my daughters room. Matches with all of her shopkins items
customer_reviews.author: diana munoz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! The sheets are awesome!! Tooo bad the comforter barely covers the top of the Full mattress!:( ( twin/full size) The mattress shows on the side! Had to pay more for a dust ruffle!!!:(
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: The product was not as described. I purchased this as a gift, and the recipient sent me a pic of the item after he washed it and it barely fit on his daughter's full size bed, it was also a very cheap material. Would not recommend this item. (it also arrived dirty).
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bedding set (sheets and all) barely fit over my daughter's ...
customer_reviews.text: Bedding set (sheets and all) barely fit over my daughter's FULL-sized bed but overall quality and design is not too shabby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Shopkins Kids 5 Piece Bed in a Bag Full Size Bedding Set - Reversible Comforter, Microfiber Sheets & Pillow Cases
product_meta.description: The cute collectible Shopkins characters are featured with this kids full size comforter set. The 5 piece bedding set includes reversible twin/full comforter, sheet set and pillow cases. The polyester comforter is designed with bright colors and silky soft polyester. The sheets and pillow cases are high quality microfiber. Features Shopkins characters Kooky Cookie, Strawberry Kiss, D'lish Donut, Apple Blossom, Lippy Lips and more. For kids and toddler bedroom décor. 100% polyester.
feature_bullets: Kids bed in a bag includes reversible microfiber comforter, sheets and pillow cases
Twin / full microfiber comforter measures 72" x 86"
High quality polyester microfiber sheets and reversible pillow cases
Features popular Shopkins characters from Shopville
Add a pillow buddy and plush blanket for a complete bed set

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
